channel.title: Comments on: First Cork OpenCoffee Club this Friday

item.title: By: EirePreneur
item.dc:creator: EirePreneur
item.description:
<strong>The Serendipity of OpenCoffee...</strong>
I don't often promote comments to full posts but this wonderful ancedote from Jan Blanchard of touristr deserves the bump up --Something strange happened to me for the last one. I went to the Clarion Hotel, looked around for some...
item.content:encoded:
The Serendipity of OpenCoffee…

I don’t often promote comments to full posts but this wonderful ancedote from Jan Blanchard of touristr deserves the bump up –Something strange happened to me for the last one. I went to the Clarion Hotel, looked around for some…
